entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
